pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Diamond Ore$(li)Glowstone$(li)Sculk Block$(li)Enchanting Table$(li)End Stone$(li)Bookshelf$(li)Diamond Block

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[215, 85, 115, 0, 0, 5]
This gem can be injected with a tier 2 injector setup.
